pageContext.content:
Harvester is a full-stack application founded by JP Evans to promote local businesses and make shopping locally as convenient as possible. Using the online Marketplace, users can browse products from local store then grab that product in the same day.

JP is an former hockey teammate of mine that I was fortunate enough to keep in contact with. The motivations for Harvester spiked during the pandemic, seeing local businesses fail and grab-all online stores like Amazon flourish.

In it’s early stages, the focus for Harvester is a userbase that consistently grows.
pageContext.title: Harvester
